name: World Class Track Meat
description:
As a world-class athlete, you yearn to compete in an extremely exclusive track and field event, but to enter, it'll cost you... Two of your limbs, specifically. But at least you get to choose which ones.

Features:
- Participate in three events: sprint, discus, and high jump!
- One song! No sound effects!
- Developer "art" and "animation"!

Made in a weekend for Ludum Dare 44 (theme: "Your life is currency").

Tools used:
- GameMaker Studio 1.4
- paint.net
- Pyxel Edit
- Reason

Fonts used:
- Kenney Mini by Kenney: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/kenney-fonts
- Josefin Sans by Santiago Orozco: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Josefin+Sans
